sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: INX Digital Set to Be Acquired by Republic on October 8, 2025
feed.summary: INX Digital Company Inc. announced that its acquisition by Republic, a global financial firm, is scheduled to close on October 8, 2025. This acquisition will involve Republic acquiring all outstanding shares of INX, leading to a temporary halt in INX Token trading and a planned cash reserve fund distribution for token holders. The transaction is expected to enhance INX's market reach and operational capabilities within the digital asset industry.

feed.title: INX Digital Company Reports Q1 2025 Financial Results Amid Acquisition by Republic
feed.summary: INX Digital Company Inc. reported its Q1 2025 financial results, focusing on expanding its crypto offerings and maintaining a dual-asset platform strategy. The company is in the process of being acquired by Republic for up to $60 million, a move expected to significantly scale its regulated digital asset infrastructure. Despite a decrease in trading fees and an increased net loss, INX is expanding its crypto asset pool and global footprint, aiming to be a trusted venue for compliant digital asset trading.
